name: Goat on Boat
description:
Unlike other pirate goat simulators, this is a coming of age story about Billy McKid! Join Billy in taking on the dream of becoming a pirate. The only problem, Billy is a stowaway!

controls
  • After starting the game, click on the screen (if using a computer)
  • Arrow keys for movement
  • "Z" (or "A" button on Gameboy) to interact with objects (e.g. cannon balls)

*Game is mobile friendly*

development

'Goat on Boat' was created in a 3 days for the Major Jam 3: Retro Gam Jam. The game jam had the limitation of only allowing 96x96 pixels for a screen, or 6x6 tiles in GB Studio. It's a small screen!
